job_description:
ContactMonkey helps businesses boost growth and productivity through their internal communications. With our powerful tech stack, businesses can create, send, and track HTML emails within Outlook or Gmail. Today, ContactMonkey's software is being leveraged within the world's leading enterprise organizations, including brands like Rogers, IKEA and Ticketmaster! We are pumped to be the best-of-breed for internal employee communications.

About The Job

As a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET), you will make an impact by using test automation, software engineering, and testing best practices concentrating on our core product.

We understand that joining a team is one of the most important decisions you make, and adding a team member is one of the most important decisions we'll make. Through our process, we want you to get to know us and understand how you approach problems, learn, and what motivates you.

What You Will Be Doing

Lead by Example: Be active within your team and the company - participate in meetings; volunteer to lead initiatives; escalate questions or issues when necessary.
Design and lead the test automation strategy.
Drive the creation of an end to end acceptance testing suite
Design, write and implement integration, component and UI tests.
Working with software engineers to design systems for testability.
Owning the evolution of the test automation strategy.

About You

6+ years of testing experience in a software domain
Prove track record with driving test automation strategies in a growth based environment.
Strong experience with leading the creation of automation software and strategy
Well developed ability to mentor team members in test automation best practices.

Experience Testing a Cloud-hosted SaaS Application

Experience with tools such as Selenium, Cucumber, RSpec and other automation tools that will accelerate our release cycles.
Ability to write clear, concise documentation
Experience with developing AP test frameworks.

How You Can Stand Out (optional)

Experience in coding in at least one modern web develop language/framework such as Ruby on Rails or Python/Django
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
Experience Designing and building JSON or REST services, AWS APIs, Docker.
As a practice, you maintain awareness of QA/automation industry practices and ensure the team is aware and educated.
Experience with Agile methodologies beyond scrum.

Why ContactMonkey?

We offer…

🏥 Comprehensive benefits program (health & dental) that starts on day 1!

🤒 5 sick days per year!

📚 Monthly stipend for personal and professional growth!

💰 Stock option plan!

🏝 Generous vacation package!

🧖 1 personal day to do as you please!

☀️ Summer hours in July and August!

🌎 Work from anywhere in the world for 6 weeks!

💼 Downtown Toronto office for a change of workspace routine!

🤝 A supportive team who celebrates successes and tackles challenges together!

Our team is reimagining what it means to send and receive valuable communications to an entire workforce. By joining ContactMonkey, rest assured our wickedly smart, high-performing team members will challenge you to learn and grow every day. We value great work and great ideas in everything we do. We're looking for talented people who want to grow their career with us while making an impact with groundbreaking ideas.
